channel.title: First Light StoryHouse on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in First Light StoryHouse on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: CJ ENM Launches First Light StoryHouse to Develop Asian Stories With Miky Lee, Janet Yang and Dominic Ng
item.description: Korean entertainment giant CJ ENM is doubling down on its commitment to Asian storytelling with the launch of First Light StoryHouse, a new label designed to elevate Asian and Asian American narrative
